title: Zobrazení oznámení
content: Dobrý den, mám povolené oznámení z konkrétního serveru. Oznámení přijde, zobrazí se na chvilku a zmizí. Jak si můžu prohlédnou historii oznámení ? Děkuji.
creator: adam.horak

title: Save versus Open
content: This must be the umteenth time i have written and never received a response. Why oh why when i just want to OPEN a document to you also SAVE it? What a waste of time, space and energy to go back in and delete all these non-essential saved documents and.or downloads. Yes i answer "OPEN" when i only want to open the document. Please, please, please give me an answer and tell me how to avoid all this frustration.
creator: mbugosh

title: Firefox not loading Instagram
content:
I've noticed in the last week or two that when I'm on my desktop and try to navigate to an Instagram profile, that 9 out of 10 times I get the error in the screenshot attached:

"Sorry, this page isn't available."

Weirdly, if I have a link to a specific instagram post, the browser will load it. But profile page? Forget about it. Anyone else having this issue, and know perhaps why Firefox is loading Instagram this way on a desktop?

title: U2F using ledger
content:
Received this message thismorning while using my Ledger device:-

Something went wrong-U2F browser support is needed for Ledger. Please use Chrome, Opera or Firefox with a U2F extension. Also make sure you're on a HTTPS connection.
creator: Traceyinvest

title: Hibakód: SEC_ERROR_PKCS11_GENERAL_ERROR
content:
Tisztelt Cím!

Ezt a dobja fel az oldal, amit előtte már 290 alkalommal megnyitottam és semmiképpen nem tudok továbblépni.

Hibakód: SEC_ERROR_PKCS11_GENERAL_ERROR

Szeretném ezt az oldalt továbbra is megnyitni és használni: https://arveres.mbvk.hu/arverezok/

Képernyőképet nem engedett készíteni.

Üdvözlettel: Csernus Tibor
creator: dr.csernus

title: bookmarks overwritten or erased ??
content:
Recently, my laptop got messed up and I've had to use a loaner provided my university. Initially I had no issue with transferring my bookmarks, as I just logged in to Firefox. However, the damn thing wipes everything whenever you log off or turn it off, and it decided to restart on its own when I left it alone for five minutes. So I was trying to recover my tabs, even though I knew it was unlikely to work, and one of the options for History said I could restore something with eleven items (I assumed it meant tabs, that sounded about right) and it warned me it would overwrite the bookmarks. I assumed that it meant the bookmarks I had at the time, which were the same bookmarks I've always had, so I said yes. But I guess it meant the default ones because the others hadn't loaded yet or something??? Because a bunch of random default tabs popped back up (not even eleven of them???) and the bookmarks are now solidly on just the default "Getting Started" and so on. I checked, it's the right account, it says my bookmarks are synced, there are no other files to restore from, and I don't get my actual laptop back for another week or two, so I can't check or restore from there. Are my bookmarks gone forever, or is there a chance I could recover them.... but only in a few weeks when I get my original laptop back (assuming THEY didn't wipe it again)? Or did it overwrite them for my profile in general, meaning it's synced and all my bookmarks are gone forever? Is there a way to restore them now, from the loaner laptop? I am in constant agony.

EDIT: Weirdly, I can still see my original bookmarks on my phone, which is promising--but I can't export a backup file from there, apparently, unless I want to import every single one one by one by sharing each one individually, which, no thank you. And I'm not sure if it's synced and am too scared to try. What's that one meme with Michael from the Good Place? "Birth is a curse and existence is a prison"? That's about how I'm feeling right now. It's 3 am.

EDIT 2: Fiddled around with it. Somehow fixed it. No fucking idea how. Sorry this was a pointless waste of cyber space. Wait, no, nevermind. I got OLD bookmarks back???? Like a few years old?????? What???????? I give up. This is better than nothing.
creator: tmbabe13

title: AdFender
content: Firefox stopped working in Firefox. I refreshed Firefox, and tried to add it to the extensions but you keep saying it is corrupt. I removed AdFender from my PC and reinstalled it, and ran it through my Security. Firefox still says it is corrupt. I see other people with the same issue. Please correct this. Let me install it even if it's "corrupt". Microsoft has no issue. it works fine in Windows 10.
creator: ommyom

title: picture in picture
content: On android using the Firefox browser app, I cannot use picture in picture when playing youtube videos. However, if I log out of my YouTube account, it will work again. The YouTube app and Google Chrome app allow PiP when logged in. I've previously been able to use PiP with no problems on Firefox, but it's now seemingly disabled under this circumstance. Why is this happening, and how can I fix this?
creator: ericzhang631

title: Firefox won't open sites or won't open them all the way
content: I am a forever Firefox user, swear by it!!!! The last 3 months or so it just isn't working right. For example, I went to open my new bank site and it went fine until the last page to actually open it and it just wouldn't come up. I even left my computer and came back after lunch and it still hadn't opened!! I try to open regular sites I use for example to pay bills, have them bookmarked.......and I click on them and they just sit on the page! I NEVER had any problems with Firefox before but the last few months have been awful! Did something happen?? Is there anything I can do on my end?? I tried another search engine and the sites open?? Please help, I love Firefox!!! Bonnie Edwards [removed email/phone# from public forum]
creator: meowbe

title: can't load programs from paramountplus.com
content: I tried the shield, changing the settings, putting it in as an exception and I still can't get my programs to load tonight. I pay for this subscription and it worked before you changed your setup. Now I never know when firefox will let it load. I hate safari, but at least it loads my shows.

title: PDF Editing Tool disappeared on version 112.0 update
content:
I just updated Firefox to 112.0. The "I-beam" shaped tool no longer appears on the toolbar, or anywhere on the Adobe page. So I can't get a text box to appear on the PDF or annotate the PDF in any way. Help! Thanks!

I'm on a HP Spectre 360 laptop, on Windows 11. Firefox 112.0.
creator: michellecarter

title: Helvetica font renders blank after updating to 112 via snap store
content:
After running `snap refresh firefox`, many sites I use no longer render any text.

Via some fiddling via the developer console, it appears to be that any text with `font-family: Helvetica`. Removing that CSS restores the text, adding it removes the text.

There's a fix for CVE-2023-29537 in this release that affects font initialization - possibly related?
creator: daniel270

Thanks - Terry

title: i have lost all my tabs so i used jeffersonscher to get them back however, i restarted my pc when i was restoring them and that jsonlz4 file that i was using got replaced by a new one that had only the tabs that i have restored
content:
i used jeffersonscher to get all my tabs back from by old session but i restarted my pc and the session store jsonlz4 file got changed with a new one that didn't have all the tabs i previously had on it. When i did the restoring my jsonlz4 file was at 1:08am but when i accidentally restarted my pc it now is saying 2:31am and all the tabs that i have restored so far are on it but not the ones i haven't restored are not.

So is there a way to be able to get that old jsonlz4 file back so that i can restore all the tabs that i used to have.

Please help.
creator: jameskennan11
